name: Crispy Chicken Tacos with Chipotle Crema and Guacamole
description: These Crispy Chicken Tacos are super easy to make and will keep you coming back for more. They're also versatile so don't hesitate to make them if you are missing a few ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the breaded chicken cutlets, slice two chicken breasts in half horizontally
recipeInstructions.name: To make the breaded chicken cutlets, slice two chicken breasts in half horizontally

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with plastic and pound thin using a mallet or the bottom of a skillet
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with plastic and pound thin using a mallet or the bottom of a skillet

recipeInstructions.text: Dredge each cutlet in flour, eggwash and breadcrumbs (Panko or cornflakes)
recipeInstructions.name: Dredge each cutlet in flour, eggwash and breadcrumbs (Panko or cornflakes)

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the cutlets for 15 minutes at 400F.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the cutlets for 15 minutes at 400F.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop baked cutlets into vertical strips when done cooking
recipeInstructions.name: Chop baked cutlets into vertical strips when done cooking

recipeInstructions.text: For the Basic Guac, finely chop a few tablespoons of onion and smoosh with a fork.
recipeInstructions.name: For the Basic Guac, finely chop a few tablespoons of onion and smoosh with a fork.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine onion with a single avocado, the juice of half a lime, and a generous pinch of salt
recipeInstructions.name: Combine onion with a single avocado, the juice of half a lime, and a generous pinch of salt

recipeInstructions.text: For the Chipotle Crema, combine 1 Tablespoon Mexican Crema (or cream), 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt, 1 garlic clove, 1 chipotle in adobo and a pinch of salt. Blend together and taste for heat level.
recipeInstructions.name: For the Chipotle Crema, combine 1 Tablespoon Mexican Crema (or cream), 1/2 cup plain Greek yogurt, 1 garlic clove, 1 chipotle in adobo and a pinch of salt. Blend together and taste for heat level.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a comal or skillet on medium high heat
recipeInstructions.name: Heat a comal or skillet on medium high heat

recipeInstructions.text: Add tortillas to comal and top with chicken, adding the additional toppings as the tortillas crisp up for the next 2-3 minutes
recipeInstructions.name: Add tortillas to comal and top with chicken, adding the additional toppings as the tortillas crisp up for the next 2-3 minutes
